channel.title: Abouts on Dr. Elliot
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Dr. Elliot

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me Hello, and welcome to my blog! I’m a self-taught programmer with a deep curiosity for how things work under the hood. Most of my time these days is spent on Lumina, my custom C++ game engine, a long-term project combining my love for systems programming, graphics, and engine architecture. By day, I’m an airline pilot, though I prefer to keep that part of my life private. If you’d like to reach out or ask questions about programming or game development, feel free to connect on Discord.
